subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When it comes to the history of interleague baseball, Pettitte may as well be the mayor of New York baseball duels, but he struggled against the Mets, needing 104 pitches for 15 outs.
snippet: When it comes to the history of interleague baseball, Pettitte may as well be the mayor of New York baseball duels, but he struggled against the Mets, needing 104 pitches for 15 outs.
